body.p: As a result, the title of IAS 28 was changed to Investments in Associates and Joint Ventures. Because the Board’s intention was not to reconsider the fundamental approach to the accounting for investments in associates established by IAS 28, the Board has incorporated into its Basis for Conclusions on IAS 28 material from the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 28 (as revised in 2003) that the Board has not reconsidered.
